quote.quotepara: Commons Daemon 1.0.4 RC1 release is available for testing at: http://people.apache.org/~mturk/daemon/ The SVN tag is:
(If voted will be renamed to COMMONS_DAEMON_1_0_4)

body.para: README claims that the native binary will be located in the dist directory after the build, but that folder does not exist, it's build in the project root.
